section.p: The sailmaster is not popular with anyone on board. His protests of innocence fall on deaf ears. You order him trussed up and bundled overboard like a sack of food that had gone off.

Some days later, passing the mess, you overhear a conversation that you realize confirms the sailmaster’s alibi. He could not possibly have committed the murder. You are filled with remorse. Gain the codeword Clanger and .
